item.title: Mimecast Ltd 10-K
item.description: Mimecast Ltd, which is in the Services-Prepackaged Software [7372] industry, SEC 10-K filing on May 27, 2021 had 43889 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: company - 440 instances 31 - 370 instances may - 357 instances march - 357 instances million - 350 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
